price: 107. Hana u doodin kuwa khiyaameeya nafahooda. Hubaal, Alle ma jecla mid kastoo ah khaa’in, denbiile.
arabic: وَلَا تُجَٰدِلۡ عَنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡتَانُونَ أَنفُسَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ مَن كَانَ خَوَّانًا أَثِيمٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walā tujādil ʿani alladhīna yakhtānūna anfusahum inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu man kāna khawwānan athīman
